markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stupor Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2016)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Incapacitation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=93" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=97" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Sleep" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=145" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 71 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 74</row>

**Price** 16 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Stupor poison is a more potent distillation of [lethargy poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=120). Further exposure to stupor poison doesn't require the target to attempt additional saving throws; only failing a saving throw against an ongoing exposure can progress its stage.

 **Saving Throw** DC 20 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 hours; **Stage 1** [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round); **Stage 2** slowed 2 and flat-footed (1 round); **Stage 3** [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) with no Perception check to wake up (1 round); **Stage 4** unconscious with no Perception check to wake up (1d6 hours)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Stupor Poison
